description: The Echo Lake™ Hoody combines the protection of a windbreaker with the benefits of sunscreen in one lightweight package. It's just what you need when you're preparing for the vertical side of a blank cliff. Because the thousands of feet below you isn't the only kind of exposure to consider. With ruthless wind and UV rays beating on your skin, a soft layer is just the antidote.
name: Mountain Hardwear Echo Lake Hoody - Mens
